mapper.select: SELECT dbt5591."gogitaiNo" ,dbt5591."gogitaiMei" ,dbt5591."gogitaiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT5591GogitaiJoho" dbt5591 WHERE dbt5591."gogitaiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= #{systemDate} AND #{systemDate} <= dbt5591."gogitaiYukoKikanShuryoYMD"

SELECT E."gogitaiMei" ,F."shichosonMeisho" ,C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
,MIN(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD") AS shinsakaiKaisaiYMDMin ,MAX(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD") AS shinsakaiKaisaiYMDMax ,COUNT(A."shinsakaiKaisaiNo") AS shinsakaiKaisaiNoCount FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" A LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" B ON A."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = B."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" C ON B."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" D ON D."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5591GogitaiJoho" E ON A."gogitaiNo" = E."gogitaiNo" AND E."gogitaiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') <= E."gogitaiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" F ON C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = F."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE D."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ikenshoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ichijiHanteiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."maskingKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL
AND C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{hokensyaNo}
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '1'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '3'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('2', '3')
AND SUBSTR(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AND A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD"
AND A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND A."gogitaiNo" = #{gogitaiNo}
AND C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY E."gogitaiMei" ,F."shichosonMeisho" ,C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"

SELECT E."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" , D."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
, COUNT(C."hihokenshaNo") AS hihokenshaCount FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" A LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" B ON A."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = B."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" C ON B."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" D ON C."shinseishoKanriNo" = D."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" E ON C."shinseishoKanriNo" = E."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" F ON C."shinseishoKanriNo" = F."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5591GogitaiJoho" G ON A."gogitaiNo" = G."gogitaiNo" AND G."gogitaiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') <= G."gogitaiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" H ON C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = H."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE A."gogitaiNo" = #{gogitaiNo} AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AND A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo} AND H."shichosonCode" = #{shichosonCode} AND F."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."ikenshoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."ichijiHanteiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."maskingKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND E."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" IN ('01', '12', '13', '21', '22', '23', '24', '25') AND D."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" IN ('01', '12', '13', '21', '22', '23', '24', '25', '31')
AND C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{hokensyaNo}
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '1'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '3'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('2', '3')
AND C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY E."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" , D."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY E."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" , D."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
